data.question: What is Aave?
choices: An online portal of the Aar Volkschtunden Eisentchaft, cooperative bank from Aar zone.
A portal where people can borrow asssets from many banks.
A portal where people can deposit assets on many banks.
data.answer: An open source and non-custodial liquidity protocol for earning interest on deposits and borrowing assets.

data.question: In order to borrow assets...
choices: An approval from Aave technics is necessary. It usually takes two to three weeks. A borrow limit is set acording to financial position and payment history of the client.
A deposit of a colateral asset is necesary, with no limit on borrowing afterwards.
A proof of humanity is required.
data.answer: A deposit of a colateral asset is necesary, and this determines the limit of the assets that can be borrowed.

data.question: The most advanced functional version of Aave is...
choices: There is no version, as ethereum blockchain is inmutable.

data.question: Aave is ...
data.answer: on both ethereum and polygon blockchain.
